scene_description_enriched: An angel with golden wings and a pink tunic hovers in a starry blue sky, holding a scroll inscribed with text. Below, two shepherds are depicted in a green, hilly landscape dotted with sheep. The shepherd on the left, wearing an orange cap and a brown cloak over a blue tunic, plays a bagpipe. The shepherd on the right, dressed in a red robe with gold trim over a blue garment, leans on a staff. The scene depicts the Annunciation to the Shepherds, a key event in the Nativity narrative.
